modules.name: Animi Shamir
modules.description: Adds the Animi Shamir to Metallurgy. Items with Animi will respawn with you when you die!
modules.important_note: Modifies items right after a player died, and might fight over those items with other Datapacks that do the same.

modules.name: Apple Trees
modules.description: Introduces fruit-bearing apple trees! Trade for apple saplings with wandering traders or find them growing in forests!
modules.important_note: Modifies the oak leaves loot table to no longer contain apples. May cause incompatibilities with Datapacks that also modify this loot table.

modules.name: Audere Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Audere' to Metallurgy. Gain Haste with low durability tools.

modules.name: Auto Crafting
modules.description: Create an auto crafter to fully automate crafting! With this module installed, all vanilla crafting recipes are added to the GM4 Custom Crafter.

modules.name: Balloon Animals
modules.description: Looking for exotic animals? This module makes some Wandering Traders sell cute baby animals!

modules.name: Bat Grenades
modules.description: Tired of the uselessness of bats? This module will turn them into tiny furry flying balls of boom!
modules.important_note: Modifies the bat loot table. May cause incompatibilities with Datapacks that also modify this loot table.

modules.name: Beehive Inspector
modules.description: Adds a handy tooltip to Beehive items, telling you exactly how many bees and how much honey is stored inside! A beekeepers' dream!

modules.name: Better Armour Stands
modules.description: Ever felt like Armour Stands looked a bit boring? Better Armour Stands lets your Armour Stands strike all the poses you want! Simply use a Book and Quill to edit Armour Stands.

modules.name: Better Fire
modules.description: Spice up Minecraft's fire mechanics with this module! Flame arrows set fire when they land and burning creepers explode when low on health!

modules.name: Block Compressors
modules.description: Chest space won't be an issue with this module! Use a Block Compressor to compress stacks of items, turning a stack of items into a single item for long-term storage. Make sure to uncompress your items before using them again, though!

modules.name: Book Binders
modules.description: Start printing your own Enchanted Books with Book Binders. Use lecterns to exract singular pages from Enchanted Books and recombine pages with Leather to create your own Enchanted Books -- free of charge!

modules.name: Bookshelf Inspector
modules.description: See what's in your Chiseled Bookshelves without having to take all the books out!

modules.name: Boots of Ostara
modules.description: A pair of boots every gardener would love to have! Boots of Ostara allow you to easily spread Grass and Moss, and they even stop the Desire Lines module from creating that pesky dirt.

modules.name: Calling Bell
modules.description: Summon a Wandering Trader by using an Emerald on a Bell.

modules.name: Cement Mixers
modules.description: Allows Liquid Tanks to convert Concrete Powder items into Concrete, at the cost of ⅓ of a Bucket of Water per Concrete Powder.

modules.name: Chairs
modules.description: Place a saddle on a stair to have a chair to sit on!

modules.name: Combat Expanded
modules.description: Use special armor and weapon modifiers to defend against mobs that grow ever stronger.

modules.name: Cooler Caves
modules.description: A custom terrain expansion pack that makes biome specific caves and mineshafts

modules.name: Cozy Campfires
modules.description: Allows Campfires to grant you up to 4 extra hearts that last for more than half of a Minecraft day. Perfect for those scary first nights in a Minecraft world.

modules.name: Crossbow Cartridges
modules.description: Shoot more than just arrows! Crossbow Cartridges allows your crossbow to fire a variety of projectiles; Shoot Pufferfish, Tripwires, Torches, and many more. Synergizes nicely with the Ziprails Module for easy Ziprail construction.

modules.name: Dangerous Dungeons
modules.description: A custom terrain expansion pack that adds new types of dungeons underground.

modules.name: Desire Lines
modules.description: Creates natural looking trodden paths in high traffic areas, but be careful not to ruin your neighbour's lawn!

modules.name: Disassemblers
modules.description: Break apart gold and iron tools and weapons for materials. Attach this to a mob farm to finally make use of those extra armour sets!

modules.name: Display Frames
modules.description: Splash item frames with invisibilty to make invisible item frames! Great for interior decor!

modules.name: Double Doors
modules.description: Tired of clicking twice to open a double door? Annoyed by the fact that doors are only two blacks tall? This data pack automatically opens adjacent doors, making double doors fully functional! Additionally, bottom trapdoors of matching wood type placed above a door are opened alongside the door when it is opened by a player.

modules.name: Dripleaf Filters
modules.description: Dripleaves will flick items that match a hopper's contents into the hopper for you!

modules.name: Dripleaf Launchers
modules.description: Start your own Dripleaf Space Program!

modules.name: Enchantment Extractors
modules.description: Remove enchantments from enchanted tools, armour, and weapons. But be careful, there might be unexpected side-effects.

modules.name: End Fishing
modules.description: Catch rare loot by fishing in the end void! The void holds many riches, from End City loot and Elytra to weapons that once belonged to explorers time forgot, collect them all!

modules.name: Ender Hoppers
modules.description: Create special hoppers that teleport nearby items to them.

modules.name: Enderman Support Class
modules.description: This module allows Endermen to aid nearby hostiles in their fight against the player!

modules.name: Everstone
modules.description: Collect Everstones during full moons and use them on baby mobs to stop them from aging! But watch out, some other mobs might start aging, too!

modules.name: Forming Press
modules.description: Create a Forming Press to unlock more efficient recipes for all types of brick and Charcoal.

modules.name: Fulcio Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Fulcio' to Metallurgy. It allows you to place blocks in mid-air! This also enables you to choose the orientation of blocks like logs without needing a supporting block.

modules.name: Guidebook
modules.description: Adds a dynamic guidebook to discover the mechanics of Gamemode 4! This provides a wiki-like experience in-game!
modules.important_note: Experimental Module! Features may be added or removed without an easy upgrade path. You may encounter unintentional behaviour.

modules.name: Heart Canisters
modules.description: Introduces two tiers of pricey canisters that increase your health when carried.

modules.name: Holographic Tags
modules.description: Set up floating messages with a simple name tag!

modules.name: Iacio Shamir
modules.description: Adds the 'Iacio' shamir to Metallurgy. It lets you throw things further! Launch an Ender Pearl into orbit or simply throw your Trident exceptionally far.

modules.name: Ink Spitting Squid
modules.description: Improves the vanilla ink effect by adding Blindness. Glow Squid will give Night Vision when disturbed, which might come in handy if you're out of torches!

modules.name: Lightning in a Bottle
modules.description: Bottle and harness the power of lightning using Brewing Stands! Lightning in a Bottle comes in splash and lingering variants, too.
modules.important_note: Brewing Stands may need to be broken and replaced to be able to craft Lightning in a Bottle when the module is first installed.

modules.name: Liquid Minecarts
modules.description: Adds Liquid Tank Minecarts that allow you to move your liquids from one Liquid Tank to another.

modules.name: Liquid Tanks
modules.description: Store liquids like Water, Lava, Milk, or Soup compactly in special tanks and interact with them!

modules.name: Live Catch
modules.description: Catch live fish when fishing! But watch out for Pufferfish, those might make for a nasty surprise!

modules.name: Lumos Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Lumos' to Metallurgy. It places torches when it is dark.

modules.name: Mending Tanks
modules.description: Enables Liquid Tanks filled with Experience to repair tools with the mending enchant on them.

modules.name: Metallurgy
modules.description: Introduces 4 custom ores, 6 custom metals and a whole bunch of custom enchants to the game. Cast metal bands that hold magical properties called 'Shamirs' and upgrade your armour and tools with them!
modules.important_note: Modifies the stone block loot table. May cause incompatibilities with Datapacks that also modify this loot table.

modules.name: Midnight Menaces
modules.description: Adds 7 new events to Mysterious Midnights! From nights with merging Slimes to scary Illusioners -- this is a variety pack you shouldn't miss out on!

modules.name: Mob Curing
modules.description: Revert mooshrooms, pigmen and witches back to their previous forms.

modules.name: Mountaineering
modules.description: A mezze of mountaineering means! Glide down slopes and scale cliffs.
modules.important_note: Experimental Module! Features may be unbalanced and added or removed without an easy upgrade path.

modules.name: Mysterious Midnights
modules.description: Full moons gain a element of surprise with Myserious Midnights! This module adds random events during full moons. You might encounter falling stars, or Skeletons wielding poisonous arrows! So you better listen for that howl...

modules.name: Note Block Interface
modules.description: Adds a neat interface to improve your musical skills!

modules.name: Orb of Ankou
modules.description: Harvest mob souls and condense them using forbidden nether magic to obtain mob abilities! Learn how to fly, or simply become turtule-man.

modules.name: Particles Pack
modules.description: Fireflies to flames, add some pezazz to your projects! Allows you to turn Armour Stands into particle sources that you control!

modules.name: Percurro Shamir
modules.description: Adds the 'Percurro' Shamir to Metallurgy! Weapons with Percurro let you teleport past your enemies in the blink of an eye!

modules.name: Phantom Scarecrows
modules.description: Set up Scarecrows that shoot homing rockets at Phantoms!

modules.name: Pig Tractors
modules.description: Ride pigs through fields to quickly harvest and plant crops! Who knows, maybe you will even dig up some useful things in the process.

modules.name: Podzol Rooting Soil
modules.description: Allows saplings to self-plant when on Podzol. The perfect choice for auto-treefarms!

modules.name: Poses Pack
modules.description: Adds a bunch of preset poses to the Better Armour Stands Module. This can be really hand for applying common poses like 'walking' or raised arms!

modules.name: Potion Liquids
modules.description: Adds the ability to store potions in Liquid Tanks! You can also use a potion by walking beneath a potion-filled Liquid Tank.

modules.name: Potion Swords
modules.description: As if getting stabbed isn't enough... support your friends, terrify your enemies, make gold great again using Golden Swords and potions!

modules.name: Record Crafting
modules.description: A crafting recipe pack that lets you craft all the records in a Custom Crafter.

modules.name: Relocators
modules.description: Craft Relocators to pick up and move containers such as chests and Custom Crafters.

modules.name: Rope Ladders
modules.description: Climbing downward has never been easier!

modules.name: SCUBA Gear
modules.description: Ease ocean exploration with craftable scuba gear!

modules.name: Shapeless Portals
modules.description: Say goodbye to your boring old rectangular portals!

modules.name: Shroomites
modules.description: Ever wondered why all the Mooshrooms are locked up on islands? This Module makes Mooshrooms spread mycelium and mushrooms wherever they go.

modules.name: Smelteries
modules.description: Build a Smeltery and double your ore output with this multi-block structure.

modules.name: Soul Glass
modules.description: Reverse the effects of beacons with corrupting glass! But be careful, a poison Beacon may sound great at first, but is incredibly painful in pratice.
modules.important_note: Blast Furnaces may need to be broken and replaced to be able to craft Soul Glass when the module is first installed.

modules.name: Spawner Minecarts
modules.description: Pick up Spawners and move them wherever you want with Minecarts.

modules.name: Speed Paths
modules.description: Gives you a speed effect when you walk on path blocks.

modules.name: Standard Crafting
modules.description: A crafting recipe pack that adds some nifty new recipes to the game.

modules.name: Sunken Treasure
modules.description: Digging sand underwater with a fortune tool can uncover buried treasures, or a nasty surprise! Who knows, maybe you'll even find some old love letters.

modules.name: Sweethearts
modules.description: Transfer your health to another player using flowers.

modules.name: Teleportation Anchors
modules.description: Suppress and control chorus-based teleportation!

modules.name: Tinkering Compressors
modules.description: Automatically compress stacks of items into their block form with a tinker shamir as a machine block, and back.

modules.name: TNT Landmines
modules.description: Craft 'em up, throw 'em down, blow 'em up! But be careful not to blow yourself up!

modules.name: Tower Structures
modules.description: A custom terrain expansion pack that adds four new tower structures to the world.

modules.name: Trapped Signs
modules.description: Craft trapped signs in a Custom Crafter which, when right-clicked, give off a redstone signal.

modules.name: Tunnel Bores
modules.description: Ever wondered how mineshafts came to be? This is it! Tunnel Bores allow you to easily dig 3⨉3 tunnels, and even lay rails behind themselves.

modules.name: Undead Players
modules.description: You'll find your death point faster, but you'll have to fight your corpse for your stuff back!
modules.important_note: Modifies items right after a player died, and might fight over those items with other Datapacks that do the same.

modules.name: Vecto Shamir
modules.description: Adds the 'Vecto' Shamir to Metallury. Summon a Boat or Minecart out of thin air when in need, no more wasting an inventory slot!

modules.name: Vertical Rails
modules.description: Use ladders as vertical Minecart tracks.

modules.name: Vigere Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Vigere' to Metallurgy. It heals you when you block with a shield.

modules.name: Washing Tanks
modules.description: Die! Dye! Remove die from items in a Liquid Tank filled with Water, at the cost of ⅓ of a bucket.

modules.name: Weighted Armour
modules.description: Perfect for UHCs, this module forces you to balance protection with speed.

modules.name: XP Storage
modules.description: Stand on top of an Ender Chest to store Experience, stand below to retrieve it!

modules.name: Zauber Cauldrons
modules.description: Powerful potions, Wormholes, portable Beacons and special armour that makes you stronger! Zauber Cauldrons adds an entire magic branch to the game.

modules.name: Zauber Liquids
modules.description: From cauldron-made potions to potion-filled tanks! Store your tier IV potions and wormholes in Liquid Tanks!

modules.name: Ziprails
modules.description: Automatically latch on to a tripwire to sail through the sky on a suspended line!

modules.name: Resource Pack
modules.description: Use our resource pack for the definitive Gamemode 4 experience! This resource pack does not touch vanilla textures, but adds textures and models to most Gamemode 4 blocks, items and mobs.
